message: Let's get started! Take 2k, I'll take 8k. Easy peasy!
Meet in the middle, let's be fair!
You said be fair, I'm offering you 3k. You can do better than that, right?
You're getting greedy, I'm making a fair offer!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. Take 4.5k, I'll take 5.5k.
I'm not falling for the compromise, I'll make the next move!
I'm not backing down! Take 4k, I'll take 6k. It's a fair split, Bob!
I'm not convinced, let's keep pushing for a better deal!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! Take 3.5k, I'll take 6.5k. It's time to wrap this up!
You're getting desperate, I'm going to make you sweat!
I'm not backing down! Take 3.2k, I'll take 6.8k. It's my final offer!
No more games, it's time to split it 50/50, or we both get nothing!
